chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
p: nat
Hp: p <> 0

Goal:
forall x, is_gcd p (proj1_sig x) 1 -> {i : Z_Zp | i ⊗ x = Op}

Premises:
Z_Zp = {x : nat | x < p} : Set
is_gcd = fun p q r : nat => divides r p /\ divides r q /\ (forall k : nat, divides k p -> divides k q -> divides k r) : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments is_gcd (_ _ _)%nat_scope
Notation Op := Zp_one
proj1_sig : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), {x : A | P x} -> A
Fin.to_nat = fix to_nat (m : nat) (n : Fin.t m) {struct n} : {i : nat | i < m} := match n in (Fin.t n0) return {i : nat | i < n0} with | @Fin.F1 j => exist (fun i : nat => i < S j) 0 (Nat.lt_0_succ j) | @Fin.FS n0 p => let (i, P) := to_nat n0 p in exist (fun i0 : nat => i0 < S n0) (S i) (lt_n_S i n0 P) end : forall m : nat, Fin.t m -> {i : nat | i < m} Arguments Fin.to_nat {m}%nat_scope
Zp_mult_one_r : forall x, x ⊗ Op = x
Zp_mult_one : forall x, Op ⊗ x = x
Zp_opp = fun H : Z_Zp => let (x, _) := H in exist (fun x0 : nat => x0 < p) (rem (p - x) p) (div_rem_spec2 (p - x) Hp) : Z_Zp -> Z_Zp
Zp_one = exist (fun x : nat => x < p) (rem 1 p) (div_rem_spec2 1 Hp) : Z_Zp
Zp_mult_assoc : forall x y z : Z_Zp, x ⊗ (y ⊗ z) = x ⊗ y ⊗ z
no_common_prime_is_coprime : forall x y : nat, x <> 0 -> (forall p : nat, prime p -> divides p x -> divides p y -> False) -> is_gcd x y 1
Fin.to_nat_of_nat : forall h : ?p < ?n, Fin.to_nat (Fin.of_nat_lt h) = exist (fun i : nat => i < ?n) ?p h where ?p : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- nat] ?n : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- nat]
Zp_mult_comm : forall x y, x ⊗ y = y ⊗ x
Zp_mult_plus_distr_r : forall x y z : Z_Zp, (y ⊕ z) ⊗ x = y ⊗ x ⊕ z ⊗ x
Zp_mult_plus_distr_l : forall x y z : Z_Zp, x ⊗ (y ⊕ z) = x ⊗ y ⊕ x ⊗ z
Zp_plus_zero : forall x, Zp ⊕ x = x
Zp_minus : forall x, x ⊕ ∸ x = Zp
bezout_rel_prime : forall p q : nat, is_gcd p q 1 -> {a : nat & {b : nat | a * p + b * q = 1 + p * q}}
eq_sig_uncurried : forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a}, {p0 : proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v | eq_rect (proj1_sig u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig u) (proj1_sig v) p0 = proj2_sig v} -> u = v where ?A : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- Type] ?P : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- ?A -> Prop]
eq_sig2_uncurried : forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}, {p0 : proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u) = proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v) | eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)) p0 = proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 v) & eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (fun a : ?A => ?Q a) (proj3_sig u) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)) p0 = proj3_sig v} -> u = v where ?A : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- Type] ?P : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- ?A -> Prop] ?Q : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- ?A -> Prop]
eq_sig_ind : forall Q : ?u = ?v -> Prop, (forall (p0 : proj1_sig ?u = proj1_sig ?v) (q : eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) p0 = proj2_sig ?v), Q (eq_sig ?u ?v p0 q)) -> forall p : ?u = ?v, Q p where ?A : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- Type] ?P : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- {a : ?A | ?P a}] ?v : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
eq_sig_rect : forall Q : ?u = ?v -> Type, (forall (p0 : proj1_sig ?u = proj1_sig ?v) (q : eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) p0 = proj2_sig ?v), Q (eq_sig ?u ?v p0 q)) -> forall p : ?u = ?v, Q p where ?A : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- Type] ?P : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- {a : ?A | ?P a}] ?v : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
eq_sig_rec : forall Q : ?u = ?v -> Set, (forall (p0 : proj1_sig ?u = proj1_sig ?v) (q : eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) p0 = proj2_sig ?v), Q (eq_sig ?u ?v p0 q)) -> forall p : ?u = ?v, Q p where ?A : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- Type] ?P : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- {a : ?A | ?P a}] ?v : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
eq_sig : forall (u v : {a : ?A | ?P a}) (p0 : proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v), eq_rect (proj1_sig u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig u) (proj1_sig v) p0 = proj2_sig v -> u = v where ?A : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- Type] ?P : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- ?A -> Prop]
eq_sig2 : forall (u v : {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}) (p0 : proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u) = proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)), eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)) p0 = proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 v) -> eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (fun a : ?A => ?Q a) (proj3_sig u) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)) p0 = proj3_sig v -> u = v where ?A : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- Type] ?P : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- ?A -> Prop] ?Q : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- ?A -> Prop]
eq_sig2_rect : forall R : ?u = ?v -> Type, (forall (p0 : proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 ?u) = proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 ?v)) (q : eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 ?u)) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 ?u)) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 ?v)) p0 = proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 ?v)) (r : eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 ?u)) (fun a : ?A => ?Q a) (proj3_sig ?u) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 ?v)) p0 = proj3_sig ?v), R (eq_sig2 ?u ?v p0 q r)) ->...-> Prop] ?u : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}] ?v : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}]
is_rel_prime_mult : forall p q l : nat, is_gcd p q 1 -> is_gcd p l 1 -> is_gcd p (q * l) 1
eq_sig_uncurried_iff : forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a}, u = v < -> {p0 : proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v | eq_rect (proj1_sig u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig u) (proj1_sig v) p0 = proj2_sig v} where ?A : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- Type] ?P : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- ?A -> Prop]
eq_sig2_uncurried_iff : forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}, u = v < -> {p0 : proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u) = proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v) | eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)) p0 = proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 v) & eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (fun a : ?A => ?Q a) (proj3_sig u) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)) p0 = proj3_sig v} where ?A : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- Type] ?P : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- ?A -> Prop] ?Q : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- ?A -> Prop]
proj2_sig_eq : forall p0 : ?u = ?v, eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) (proj1_sig_eq p0) = proj2_sig ?v where ?A : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- Type] ?P : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- {a : ?A | ?P a}] ?v : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
prime = fun p : nat => p <> 1 /\ (forall q : nat, divides q p -> q = 1 \/ q = p) : nat -> Prop Arguments prime _%nat_scope
bezout_rel_prime_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> is_gcd p q 1 -> {a : nat & {b : nat | a * p + b * q = 1 + p * q /\ a <= q /\ b <= p}}
proj3_sig_eq : forall p0 : ?u = ?v, eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 ?u)) (fun a : ?A => ?Q a) (proj3_sig ?u) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 ?v)) (proj1_sig_of_sig2_eq p0) = proj3_sig ?v where ?A : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- Type] ?P : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- ?A -> Prop] ?Q : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}] ?v : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}]
rew_sig : forall (Q : forall a : ?A, ?P a -> Prop) (u : {p0 : ?P ?x | Q ?x p0}) (y : ?A) (H : ?x = y), eq_rect ?x (fun a : ?A => {p : ?P a | Q a p}) u y H = exist (Q y) (eq_rect ?x ?P (proj1_sig u) y H) match H as x in (_ = a) return (Q a (eq_rect ?x ?P (proj1_sig u) a x)) with | eq_refl => proj2_sig u end where ?A : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- Type] ?x : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- ?A] ?P : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- ?A -> Type]
natr_ring_lemma1 : forall (n : nat) (l : list nat) (lpe : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr N * Ring_polynom.PExpr N)) (pe1 pe2 : Ring_polynom.PExpr N), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist 0 1 Init.Nat.add Init.Nat.mul (SRsub Init.Nat.add) (SRopp (R:=nat)) eq N.to_nat id_phi_N (pow_N 1 Init.Nat.mul) l lpe ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval 0 1 Init.Nat.add Init.Nat.mul (SRsub Init.Nat.add) (SRopp (R:=nat)) N.to_nat id_phi_N (pow_N 1 Init.Nat.mul) l pe1 = Ring_polynom.PEeval 0 1 Init.Nat.add Init.Nat.mul (SRsub Init.Nat.add) (SRopp (R:=nat)) N.to_nat id_phi_N (pow_N 1 Init.Nat.mul) l pe2
proj2_sig_of_sig2_eq : forall p0 : ?u = ?v, eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 ?u)) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 ?u)) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 ?v)) (proj1_sig_of_sig2_eq p0) = proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 ?v) where ?A : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- Type] ?P : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- ?A -> Prop] ?Q : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}] ?v : [p : nat Hp : p <> 0 |- {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}]
is_rel_prime_expo : forall p q l : nat, is_gcd p q 1 -> is_gcd p (mscal Init.Nat.mul 1 l q) 1
rel_prime_mult : forall a b c : nat, is_gcd a c 1 -> is_gcd b c 1 -> is_gcd (a * b) c 1
Zp_mult = fun H : Z_Zp => let (x, _) := H in fun H0 : Z_Zp => let (y, _) := H0 in exist (fun x0 : nat => x0 < p) (rem (x * y) p) (div_rem_spec2 (x * y) Hp) : Z_Zp -> Z_Zp -> Z_Zp
Zp_plus = fun H : Z_Zp => let (x, _) := H in fun H0 : Z_Zp => let (y, _) := H0 in exist (fun x0 : nat => x0 < p) (rem (x + y) p) (div_rem_spec2 (x + y) Hp) : Z_Zp -> Z_Zp -> Z_Zp
measure_rect : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> nat) (P : X -> Type), (forall x : X, (forall y : X, m y < m x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall x : X, P x
mscal_S : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (n : nat) (x : X), mscal m u (S n) x = m x (mscal m u n x)
divides_is_gcd : forall a b c : nat, divides a b -> is_gcd b c 1 -> is_gcd a c 1
mult_is_one : forall p q : nat, p * q = 1 -> p = 1 /\ q = 1

```coq
intros x Hgcd.
unfold is_gcd, divides in Hgcd.
destruct Hgcd as [Hdivx [Hdiv1 Hrel]].
exists (exist _ 1 Hdiv1).
rewrite Zp_mult_one_r.
apply Zp_mult_one.
Qed.```

original: intros x Hgcd. unfold is_gcd, divides in Hgcd. destruct Hgcd as [Hdivx [Hdiv1 Hrel]]. exists (exist _ 1 Hdiv1). rewrite Zp_mult_one_r. apply Zp_mult_one.
